summary: This bill reauthorizes and amends the Snow Water Supply Forecasting Program. It focuses on improving snowpack measurement and integrated modeling technologies to enhance water supply forecasting accuracy and timeliness. The bill updates definitions and focuses, emphasizing the use of new technologies like imaging spectroscopy, machine learning, and integrated modeling. It also modifies reporting requirements, clarifies program goals, and outlines specific areas of focus within the program while adjusting funding levels. The overall aim is to improve water management and reservoir operations, particularly in light of changing climate conditions.
